title: The Great Escape
description: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

title: The Birds
description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

title: Tom Jones
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of an adopted bastard in 18th-century England.

title: 8½
description: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

title: Hud
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: An honest hard-working rancher, Homer Bannon, has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism and rebellion.

title: Cleopatra
description: Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.

title: Charade
description: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen.

title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
description: A group of motorists witness an accident in the California desert, and after hearing the dying driver's words, they embark on a wild race to find a stash of stolen cash.

title: Lilies of the Field
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A traveling handyman becomes the answer to the prayers of nuns who wish to build a chapel in the desert.

title: High and Low
description: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for a huge ransom.

title: From Russia with Love
description: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E.

title: America America
description: A young Greek man struggles to leave the oppression of the Ottoman Empire for the dream of a new life in the United States.

title: The Leopard
description: The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860s Sicily.

title: Jason and the Argonauts
description: The legendary Greek hero leads a team of intrepid adventurers in a perilous quest for the legendary Golden Fleece.

title: The Haunting
description: Hill House has stood for about 90 years and appears haunted: its inhabitants have always met strange, tragic ends. Now Dr. John Markway has assembled a team of people who he thinks will prove whether or not the house is haunted.

title: The Pink Panther
description: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he steals a priceless diamond.

title: Irma la Douce
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of Music, Adaptation or Treatment
description: A former policeman falls in love with a prostitute and tries to get her out of the business by becoming her only client, using a disguise.

title: The Servant
description: A wealthy young Londoner hires a manservant, who gradually begins to manipulate his master's life.

title: Contempt
description: Screenwriter Paul Javal's marriage to his wife Camille disintegrates during movie production as she spends time with the producer.

title: The Silence
description: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son, travel to a Central European country on the verge of war, where the sisters' relationship is tested.

title: Lord of the Flies
description: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

title: Billy Liar
description: A lazy, irresponsible young clerk in provincial Northern England escapes his dreary life through vivid, walter mitty-esque daydreams.

title: This Sporting Life
description: A frank, grim and realistic look at the rise of a Yorkshire coal miner to the local rugby league team.

title: The Nutty Professor
description: To improve his social life, a nerdish professor drinks a potion that temporarily turns him into the handsome, but obnoxious, Buddy Love.

title: Bye Bye Birdie
description: A rock star's personal appearance in a small town turns into a media circus.

title: McLintock!
description: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

title: 55 Days at Peking
description: US Marine Major Matt Lewis leads the defense of the foreign compound in Peking during the Boxer Rebellion of 1900.

title: Captain Newman, M.D.
description: During World War II, a compassionate psychiatrist runs the neuropsychiatric ward at an Army Air Corps hospital in Arizona.

title: The Cardinal
description: A young American priest rises up the church hierarchy to the college of cardinals.

title: Love with the Proper Stranger
description: Rocky and Angie are two Italian-Americans who were once lovers. When Angie finds herself pregnant, she tracks down Rocky to help her get enough money for an abortion.

title: The V.I.P.s
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A group of passengers are grounded at a London airport and must face the personal problems they are trying to flee.

title: Shock Corridor
description: A journalist determines to solve a murder committed in a mental institution by committing himself.

title: Donovan's Reef
description: Three World War II Navy veterans stay on a South Sea island and run a local watering hole, but their paradise is disrupted when a Boston socialite arrives.

title: A Child Is Waiting
description: Jean Hansen becomes a teacher at a school for intellectually disabled children, where she becomes attached to a boy named Reuben.

title: Sunday in New York
description: Eileen Tyler comes to New York City to visit her pilot brother and alleviate her romantic woes, only to find herself in a complicated situation.

title: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
description: Three different stories of Italian social mores are presented, all starring Sophia Loren and Marcello Mastroianni.

title: The Big City
description: A middle-class housewife in 1950s Kolkata takes a job as a saleswoman to help her family financially, challenging traditional gender roles.

title: Black Sabbath
description: A trio of atmospheric horror tales about a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster who preys on his family, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring.

title: Move Over, Darling
description: A woman who had been lost at sea for five years returns home on the day her husband is marrying another woman.

title: The Ugly American
description: An intelligent and articulate American ambassador to a Southeast Asian country is taken advantage of by a local politician.

title: Toys in the Attic
description: A man returns to his New Orleans home with a child bride, stirring up trouble with his two spinster sisters.

title: Twilight of Honor
description: A young lawyer is appointed to defend a man accused of murdering a local hero, but faces hostility from the town.

title: Spencer's Mountain
description: A Wyoming family makes sacrifices so that their eldest son can attend college.

title: Fun in Acapulco
description: Mike Windgren works as a boat hand in Acapulco, Mexico. When he gets fired, he gets a job as a singer and lifeguard.

title: A New Kind of Love
description: A cynical American reporter in Paris mistakes a visiting fashion designer for a high-priced call girl.

title: The L-Shaped Room
description: A pregnant French woman moves into a cheap London boarding house and befriends the misfits living there.

title: El Verdugo
description: An undertaker gets married to an executioner's daughter and, though he wishes to emigrate to Germany, he is forced by his father-in-law to take over his job.

title: The Sword in the Stone
description: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

title: Papa's Delicate Condition
description: A railroad executive who likes to drink too much buys a circus to make his daughter happy.

title: Le Feu Follet
description: A recovering alcoholic visits his friends in Paris in search of a reason to live.
